name: Earth Roots
description: Earth Roots: This is a 1-person adventure game that will definitely keep you entertained! Find out the secret of your family's roots, what awaits in the depths of the earth? Explore many locations, playable characters and explore all the possibilities of the game! Exciting storyline, open area, many secrets and unsolved mysteries! All this awaits you in Earth Roots! What are you waiting for? Time to start the adventure!
